title: 3b - Rows 2 and 3 - 3 Manage Complexity with Vars

content.question: Capture and paste two program code segments you developed during the administration of this task that contain a variable being used in your program. The first program code segment must show an assignment being made to the variable.

frqParts.text: Capture and paste two program code segments you developed during the administration of this task that contain a variable being used in your program. The first program code segment must show an assignment being made to the variable.
The second program code segment must show the variable being used as part of fulfilling the programâ€™s purpose.
Provide a written response that: (Approx. 200 words, exclusive of program code) identifies the name of the variable being used in this response,
describes what the data contained in the variable represents in your program, and
explains how the variable manages complexity in your program code by explaining why your program code could not be written, or how it would be written differently, if you did not use this variable.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Generalize data sources through variables.
